list.name: tree closed
list.query: SELECT status_value,reason,who,status,tree FROM "six_month"."treestatus" WHERE "tree" =~ /mozilla-[cri]|^try$/ AND "status" = 'closed' AND $timeFilter

list.name: tree open
list.query: SELECT status_value,reason,who,status,tree FROM "six_month"."treestatus" WHERE "tree" =~ /mozilla-[cri]|^try$/ AND "status" = 'open' AND $timeFilter

Time region for panel Active vs Queue
